songs.lyrics:
Ooh, clap your hands everybody
Can you feel it?
Can you feel it? ohh
The sun is shining nah
Nothing but blue sky
The storm has gone away
Here comes the perfect day
The burdens up off my shoulder
Plus my struggles over
Climbed the mountains and we made it here

Chorus:
Can you feel it? can you feel it? can you feel it? can you feel it?
Can you feel it? ooh can you feel it yeah, can you feel it? can you feel it oohh, can you feel it? can you feel it?
Show your hand if you feel it...
The wind is underneath
About to spread my wings
Take off like a bird
Cause i've been set free....
songs.title: Can You Feel It
